changes.title: Army lists updated for version 2.24!
description: You can now create army lists that align wiht version 2.24 of the Warmaster Revolutions Army Book.
Existing armies can be migrated to use the new data sources.
It is HIGHLY recommended that you either migrate these existing armies, or create brand new armies.

changes.title: UI Improvements
description: Move Stat order from ATT/HITS/ARMOUR to ATT/ARMOUR/HITS

changes.title: Fix to army duplication
description: Armies that were duplicated were incorrecty updating both the duplicated army, as well as the original army.

changes.title: Army count not correctly updating in army list
description: On the army list screen, army points were not being updated when the points were changed in the builder

changes.title: Incorrect description for elven bolt throwers
description: Elven bolt throwers were incorrectly displaying rules for regular bolt throwers.
